item.title: About
item.description:
This website was created by Ginger Bill. It is mostly a compilation of the stuff I find interesting, personal projects, and other rubbish.

Contact information

  • Twitter: @TheGingerBill
  • Email: bill@gingerbill.org
  • YouTube: GingerGames
  • GitHub: gingerBill

Some of the things that I used to create this website

  • Hugo is a static site generator written in Go(lang)
  • GitHub Pages - Web Host
  • Sublime Text 3 - The best text editor I have used so far
